message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $18,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still not able to meet at $16,500. Would you consider $15,500?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $16,000?  This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am unable to meet at $16,000. Would you consider $15,750?
